data.message: Facebook, we and several others Hate Live videos and the notifications as well. Can this be turned off. Most of the videos are trash and foolishness. I await your response. Notifications of friends should not have been moved and replaced with notifications of Live videos.

replies.message: Hi June. You can turn off Live video notifications by adjusting your settings. To get started, simply select your preference under Live Videos: http://bit.ly/2h00oPs. -Joe
